TEXT.TITLE: FHLBB CHANGES SHORT-TERM DISCOUNT NOTE RATES
TEXT.BODY:
The Federal Home Loan Bank Board adjusted the rates on its short-term discount notes as follows: MATURITY NEW RATE OLD RATE MATURITY 30-273 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 30-273 days 274-294 days 5.90 pct 5.92 pct 274-294 days 295-344 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 295-344 days 345-360 days 5.93 pct 5.93 pct 345-360 days
Reuter
